data.title: COLORS Donates to SMGH OBGYN Ward
data.description: Local Department Store COLORS recently made a generous and heartfelt donation to patients of the OBGYN Ward of St. Maarten Medical Center (SMMC). The store has provided gift vouchers that will be distributed to mothers upon discharge, offering them and their newborns an opportunity to receive gifts for their newborn babies.
data.author: By Author
